author: Peter Rudegeair
title: PayPal Profit Up on Mobile Payments, Cross-Border Trade
text:
PayPal Holdings Inc. said Wednesday that first-quarter profit rose by a third thanks to increases in mobile payments and cross-border trade.
Shares rose more than 4% in aftermarket trading.
The San Jose, Calif.-based financial-technology reported a quarterly profit of $511 million, or 42 cents a share. That compares with $384 million, or 32...
